zombie.pestilence:
§aPestilence
§7Deals AOE damage every second, shredding armor by 25%.
zombie.enrage:
§cEnrage
§7Gets real mad once in a while.
zombie.thermonuclear:
§5Thermonuclear
§7Charges up and releases a massive explosion.

enderman.malevolent-hitshield:
§aMalevolent Hitshield
§8At 100%/66%/33% HP
§7Gain a shield for 15 hits, reduced on hit regardless of damage.
Receives §c-75% ⫽Ferocity§7 from your hits while the shield is NOT active.
enderman.yang-glyphs:
§5Yang Glyphs
§8Starting at 50% HP
§7Throws glyphs down.
Stand next to them or die.
enderman.nukekubi-fixations:
§eNukekubi Fixations
§8Starting at 33% HP
§7Spawns weard heads.
Clear them by looking at them or suffer damage.
enderman.broken-heart-radiation:
§dBroken Heart Radiation
§8Halfway between Hitshields
§7Spins lasers, dont hit them!

slayer.rngmeter-lore:
§8%mobname%
 
§7Your §dRNG Meter §7fills with §d%slayer% XP §7every time you defeat §a%mobname% III§7 or higher!
 
When your meter is full, your selected drop will be guaranteed to drop the next time you defeat the boss!
